info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 2:02PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Deer Lodge, north central Silver Bow and southern Powell Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 202 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Warm Springs, or near Anaconda, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half-inch size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Anaconda, Warm Springs, and Opportunity. This includes Interstate 90 between mile markers 200 and 208. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
